posts.post_content:
Am moving my home in the next week, so now's as good a time as any to finally sell some of my duplicate T206s.  

PayPal please, and prefer it to come through as a purchase -- I recognize that the Net54 norm is to usually do it as money owed or gift, but I feel that they provide a good service in terms of convenience as well as security for both buyer as seller that they deserve the 2.9%.  These prices already include that, in case they initially seem a little on the high end.

Shipping is $3, add 50 cents for each add'l card. If exceed $100, shipping will start at $5 so as to include insurance.

Please e-mail me with confirms or questions, as it's much easier for me to respond, although I will endeavor to respect both e-mails and PMs in the order received.

Thanks,
--S



Cicotte - Sweet Caporal - raw - multiply creased - $25 Sold
Gasper - Sovereign 350 - raw - three notable creases - $38
Birmingham - Sweet Caporal - PSA 5 - $130 Pending
Chase - Sweet Caporal fact 42 no overprint - PSA 2 (nice for grade) - $45 Sold
Dougherty (arm in air) - Polar Bear - PSA 3 - $45
Egan - Polar Bear - PSA 3 - $35
Evans - Piedmont - PSA 2 (nice for grade) - $25 Sold
Ford - Polar Bear - PSA 3 - $45 Sold
Hulswitt - Polar Bear - PSA 3MK (faint remnant of pencil on front lower-left corner)- $25 Sold
Davy Jones - Piedmont - PSA 4.5 - $70 Sold
Knight (with bat) - Sweet Caporal - PSA 5 -$105
Krause (pitching) - Polar Bear - PSA 4 - $60
Lennox - Piedmont - PSA 4.5 - $70
Manning (batting) - Piedmont - PSA 5 - $105
McIntyre (brooklyn & chicago) - Sweet Caporal - PSA 5 - $115
Thebo - Piedmont - PSA 2 - $50 Pending

I'll take this one. (Ford - Polar Bear - PSA 3 - $45)

Please let me know if still available.

         Thank you, Tony

Thanks all for the great response.  List updated to reflect sales of the Chase, Evans, Hulswitt, and Jones; as well as commitments on the Cicotte, Birmingham, Ford, and Thebo.
Thanks,
--S

List updated to reflect Cicotte and Ford being sold.  Will aim to ship tomorrow.
Thanks,
--S
